text:
@cmprachanda @YouTube @PM_nepal_ @speaker_nepal @kantipurdaily yo hindu dharmawali rajawadi ko krtut---
 mama (kazi) lai bua lekhieko chh, khdka jaat ki lai samdup lama lekhieko,kumar subba ex muntri ko bhai  70 brs bhupal,belayeti naag le afnai 30 brs ko chhori(jethi sasu ko chhori) lai bihe gri yo nag jari greko,
@kmrpaudel @tufanjee @kantipurdaily Co-Existence is one part, conservationist also need to think on ways to decrease hassles the local people living by the park go through.
@kmrpaudel @tufanjee @kantipurdaily "Conservation programs must be redesigned so humans & tigers can co-exist in this shared landscape." Exactly!!

Nepal has doubled its tigers but has already lost 29 people to tigers since just 2019, tragically. Conservation programs must be redesigned so humans & tigers can co-exist in this shared landscape.

@tufanjee reports for @kantipurdaily w/ my opinion https://t.co/YY2BVgFRGH
